description.full: Your favorite characters are back in the Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa™ video game, based on the DreamWorks Animation movie! Join Alex, Marty, Melman, Gloria, those crafty penguins and their entire madcap Madagascar™ crew in an all-new action-packed journey to save the African savannah. With over 10 playable characters, 12 distinct levels, and 8 multiplayer mini-games, Madagascar: Escape 2 Africa is guaranteed to deliver a diverse, fun and wacky adventure like never before!
